title: Exploring space: the sun and its energy. - 2nd ed.
creator_credit: Lee W. Gluckman and Coronet Instructional Media
brief_description: Uses simulation to show the space shuttle Enterprise placing a solar observatory into orbit. Describes the sun’s physical characteristics, explains its effect on earth and briefly the possibilities of solar energy.
